name: Road Rush Racer - Endless Arcade Racer
name_original: Road Rush Racer - Endless Arcade Racer
description:
Ignore all speed limits and traffic rules! In this furious racing game you drive with top speed through heavy traffic and try to get as far as possible, if you collide with another car the rad trip is over! Let the asphalt burn and climb the Leaderboard!

Features:
• One Tap Gameplay: Simple to learn, hard to master
• 70 different Cars with different Attributes
• NEW: Action-Events
• Awesome Graphics and Driving Physics
• Many different Environments
• Boost and Time-Slow Power-Up
• Get the Highscore to unlock new Cars
• Collect Coins to get new Cars
• Record and Share your Gameplay!
• Several Options let you customize the game the way you like it
